b:widget.title: Why career counselling is need of the day

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: To know once strength and interests
To go in the Right Direction

At Career Sparkle, we understand that finding the right career path can be a daunting task, especially when you're not sure about your interests, strengths, and capabilities. At Career Sparkle, we work on four pillars: Gamification, Personalized Learning, Accessibility, and Students with Disabilities.
